extendedInfo.description: Calorie Counter, from the #1 health website Everyday Health, makes reaching your goal weight easier than ever before! Set goals, track calories consumed AND burned, find friends, and read expert advice â all from your Android device. We created the best user experience of any dieter tracker:Features:â¢ FASTEST calorie search for food and exercise availableâ¢ SMARTEST auto suggest - instant results as you typeâ¢ FEWEST number of taps to enter a new foodâ¢ PRECISE and customizable calorie counts for any food and quantity, including foods, store brands, and restaurant foodsâ¢ WORKS OFFLINE without internet connectionYour customized Calorie Counter will automatically sync up with EverydayHealth.com, your personalized health site for managing every aspect of your health and weight:â¢ Most up-to-date diet, nutrition, and fitness tips from the industry's top expertsâ¢ Exclusive access to celebrity weight-loss secretsâ¢ Community support from thousands of active online membersâ¢ Customized meal plans, exercise programs, weight tracker, food and fitness journal and diary, shopping lists, BMI calculator and 1,000+ healthy recipesâ¢ All your data and goals will be backed up onlineSupports versions 2.1 and higher.

reviews.title: Glitches and Lags
reviews.comment: App keeps deleting items (food and exercise) that were just entered. Some items in list won\'t allow you to change the amounts consumed or are unclear on serving size. Freezes constantly - keep having to force close. Would be nice if you could select more accurate portion sizes, or group and save items together for recipes that are repeated.
reviews.author: Melissa Syphus

reviews.title: Will uninstall it.
reviews.comment: I was disappointed that this app asked for permission to record audio at any time without confirmation. Because of this I will uninstall it. I used the calorie counter all the time on the computer to record my calorie intake and was looking forward to using this on my new android. I don\'t like this permission, I can\'t see why it is necessary, so it will remove it.
reviews.author: Antonia Warren

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Works for me!!!
reviews.author: Karla Sechel

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: I like it
reviews.author: Luke Cloete

reviews.title: I highly recommend
reviews.comment: This is a great app. Just wish that it had a way to better way to remember and access the commonly used foods that I eat. I hate having to look and scan them each time. Love it though!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A-/A app. I want a widget!
reviews.comment: Love this app! It\'s straightforward and easy to use, and it is loaded with different food choices. It has wonderful tips and articles, nothing that\'s too long, and really keeps you on track. A widget would make this an A+ app
reviews.author: Krista Schuller

reviews.title: Error in adding items
reviews.comment: Of late, it just shows a null quantity for some foods. So I can\'t add them. It\'s quite a pain when this happens. Restart also doesn\'t work. Please fix asap.
reviews.author: Sudeep Singh

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: The old version via computer had a graph that tracked protein and sugar etc. Please bring it back. Also I can only enter food to the new version on my phone--it crashes on the computer. It crashes when it tries to transfer old info to my new journal--I have tried to transfer info on my computer and on my phone it is not an option. Don\'t make me switch apps please fix it!!
reviews.author: EAP RUFFIN

reviews.title: Will not open
reviews.comment: I just downloaded this app input all my information and now it just days sync but don\'t do more then that. I will delete now! Waste of time.
reviews.author: kitiara jones

reviews.title: I can\'t log in anymore
reviews.comment: I used to love this app. Then for some reason it says my email or password are not in their database when I can log in on their site.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: SUCKS!
reviews.comment: Glitching, changes my entries, both the names and the calorie amounts, force closes, freezes, takes FOREVER -very laggy- to type things in, and this whole google+ stuff is stupid.
reviews.author: rachie n

reviews.title: Ok with some bugs.
reviews.comment: Recently started having issues with null calorie values and foods that were previously added disappearing. Has s good food database but is slow to search.
reviews.author: Stephanie Lee

reviews.title: Ugh
reviews.comment: Everything worked good till I signed out and then signed back in. And then.... All the data from my last 3 weeks (i just started doing this) was GONE! Now I am gonna go look for another app but hope this gets fixed cuz i really like this one
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This app helped my weight lose journey!
reviews.comment: This app is very helpful but there are still lots of bugs that need fixen. When ur searching an item, not one u\'ve already created, the key board locks up and takes 30 to 40 seconds to react to the buttons being pushed. much faster to create everything u input and reuse them again and again. Although it shouldn\'t be nessasary.someone please fix that!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Frustrated......
reviews.comment: I love this app, except for one major factor in my book. Once you set it up if you input wrong info you CAN\'T change it. So my calorie limit is wrong. Frustrating because trying to lose weight is hard enough without having faulty apps.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app for counting kC
reviews.comment: Appreciate that app has the full database of food and u can + custom. Wish it was not so lg. & had the h2o and vitamin tracking from website. Has strange little bug where it double or triple enters a food. Love the calorie deficit calculation it does. Can see immediately how your daily activities affect the calories you\'ve consumed.
reviews.author: S. Spyker

reviews.title: Great app, but error with dates
reviews.comment: Used to be 5 stars but it keeps deleting food from one day or moving them forward/back a day which really screws me up. Restarting and reinstalling doesn\'t help. Fix and it\'ll be back to 5
reviews.author: Brittany Shelton

reviews.title: Poor apps, fix it
reviews.comment: I tried to get my email but had a problem with this app so I uninstalled ..thanks anyways
reviews.author: Edna Serrano

reviews.title: Good when the app actually works
reviews.comment: I\'m having the same problem as Shannon.  I used to like this app but now I can\'t use it.  I keep getting a message saying \"your username or password has not been recognized by our system\".  I checked everything to make sure it was correct and even tried uninstalling and reinstalling the program and still had problems.  I even tried making a new account and it wouldn\'t let me.  I contacted the help desk was not very helpful.  I got tired of repeating the problem was with the app and not the website and yes, I\'ve check my password many times to make sure it was correct.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love how simple it is but...
reviews.comment: Keeps freezing, force closing. Love the design but its soooo frustrating:(
reviews.author: A Google User
